member.name: T:System.Data.Services.Client.MergeOption
member.summary: Determines the synchronization option for sending or receiving entities to or from WCF Data Services.

member.name: F:System.Data.Services.Client.MergeOption.AppendOnly
member.summary: Append new entities only. Existing entities or their original values will not be modified. No client-side changes are lost in this merge. This is the default behavior.

member.name: F:System.Data.Services.Client.MergeOption.OverwriteChanges
member.summary: All current values on the client are overwritten with current values from the data service regardless of whether they have been changed on the client.

member.name: F:System.Data.Services.Client.MergeOption.PreserveChanges
member.summary: Current values that have been changed on the client are not modified, but any unchanged values are updated with current values from the data service. No client-side changes are lost in this merge.

member.name: F:System.Data.Services.Client.MergeOption.NoTracking
member.summary: Objects are always loaded from persisted storage. Any property changes made to objects in the object context are overwritten by the data source values.
